column5: Test that associations are inserted properly, as they are supposed to be inserted, with no exception thrown.
Test that exception is thrown, because $number parameter is specifying the length of all the arrays, and is higher than at least one of the arrays.
Test that recommendations are inserted properly, as they are supposed to be inserted, with no exception thrown.
Test that exception is thrown, because $number parameter is specifying the length of all the arrays, and is higher than at least one of the arrays.
